title: Jeff Glucker (Hooniverse, Shift Talkers)
description:
Jeff Glucker is an automotive journalist and the host of Motor Trend's new show, "Shift Talkers." The show features people from the automotive community answering trivia questions and only one person can win. He also hosts videos for Kelly Blue Book, has a badass Montero, and is full of weird voices.

 

Follow him: @hooniversejeff

Watch Shift Talkers: https://www.motortrendondemand.com/show/shift-talkers/3642/

Watch the show: https://youtu.be/HBfraNnOKE0
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
